Mexican Spanish: Tengan cuidado con las líneas eléctricas
English: Be careful with the power lines
Thank you for your hard work

Mexican Spanish: ¿Dónde está la estación de metro más cercana?
English: Where is the nearest metro station?

Mexican Spanish: Una mesa para dos por favor

English: Where can I take a taxi?
Can you show me on the map...?
When does the next bus leave?
Can you take a photo of me?
What will the weather be like tomorrow?
How long does the trip take?
Can you give me a receipt?
